Overview   Service  Command 

Service zimbraRepl

Command Summary
BecomeMaster Tell slave host to failover and become master. [NetworkEdition only]
BringDownServiceIP Bring down the configured service IP address. [NetworkEdition only]
BringUpServiceIP Bring up the configured service IP address. [NetworkEdition only]
ReplicationStatus Report on replication status. [NetworkEdition only]
StartCatchup Start catchup. [NetworkEdition only]
StartFailoverClient Start Failover client on replication slave. [NetworkEdition only]
StartFailoverDaemon Start Failover daemon on replication master. [NetworkEdition only]
StopFailoverClient Stop Failover client on replication slave. [NetworkEdition only]
StopFailoverDaemon Stop Failover daemon on replication master. [NetworkEdition only]
